title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 6.5? Click Here!
body:
> #***Update March 11th:***

> If you are using an Nvidia Graphics Card with the latest driver, there are some [known instability](https://forums.geforce.com/default/topic/921332/geforce-drivers/official-364-47-game-ready-whql-display-driver-feedback-thread-released-3-7-16-/) with it that are causing crashing/freezing with League of Legends.  Make sure that you download their updated driver (364.51) which should help to resolve this.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Hey everybody,

[Rotating Game modes are coming back!](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue)

http://i.imgur.com/zGz0Fy6.png

While it may be sitting out for this particular patch, we want to make sure that everyone patches up smoothly so that there won't be any annoying problems in the way of getting into some crazy new League action.  If you do hit a snag, the steps below should help squash it and get you into the client!

----------------------------------------------

> #***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> #***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

> #***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: So far, the last 3 times I've logged into League not 5 seconds after, my computer freezes and is unfixed by time, what is happening? Im afraid to log on xD

This is definitely not a common thing to occur after updating.  Unfortunately, its hard to identify the exact reason why this could be occur, but generally it is for two reasons:  The installation is corrupt or there is a weird software/hardware interaction going on with your physical computer.

Since the latter can be pretty intense to diagnose, a good first step is to rule out the former as a possible to root cause.  To that end, make sure to perform a [full and clean re-installation](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to see if this resolves the issue.

Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!

This same error is happening to me as well. Repaired, uninstalled and its STILL freezing my whole computer. EVEN tried spamming the "try this in a draft mode game" quick fix and that just keeps me stuck in an empty matchmaking room. fun times
yeah after everything, mine is still not working.... insta crashes my computer as soon as i log in

If a re-install doesn't appear to have helped the situation at all, then the next best thing to look at is any type of software/hardware problems.  If you use an Nvidia Graphics Card, they did recently confirm that there is [some instability with their latest Graphics Driver](https://forums.geforce.com/default/topic/921332/geforce-drivers/official-364-47-game-ready-whql-display-driver-feedback-thread-released-3-7-16-/)

Also, make sure to complete all of the steps in our Game Crash Guide.  The steps there should help stabilize your computer to prevent further freezing!

Hey!
I have the same problem, when I log in, I can't click on anything, the whole client automatically freezes, then my whole computer.
I tried everything which I have read on forums:
- Reinstall
- Compatibility change (Changed to Win 7 and also Windows xp service pack 3 ((It usually works for me!!)) )
- Run as administrator
- Wait a few mins to unfreeze (it didn't), but after it my computer just freezes like before

I had to force my computer to restart like 10 times, no joking. And i guess it's not really good for it, so please I really need your help!

I'm not a computer expert, I only know these ways to try to fix it. 
Has anyone have the same problem as me? If u do, please write me, maybe together with a little help could fix it! :)
Me too, I tried every method, but it still does not work. I am consider about quit this Game

I keep getting the "Unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information" error. When it first started LoL had just finished updating and my computer froze, so I manually restarted and went back into league for it to start doing this. I've gone through Connection Issues Guide and did what I could, but nothing has fixed it or helped at all. Please help!

Depending on where you get the "Unspecified Error" message, it may not actually be related to your connection at all!  To that end, could you give a bit more information on where exactly you get it?  What percentage is the patcher at?

Reply back and let me know, and I should be able to help out! :)
I tried the re-installation, and the client is still freezing, any ideas on what I could do to get it fixed?

Thanks for the quick response! A friend suggested I try the repair option, and that worked, I'm now able to get to the log in screen and successfully log on, like I get into the main page where I can view my summoner information or join a game, but now every time I do that, my computer freezes, and I honestly have no clue if it's the game or just my computer :s

I have never had any trouble with league until now. I patched and everything just fine but when I log in it just freezes....everything. computer and all does anyone else have this problem? or a solution!!??{{summoner:11}}

O.o  It is really rare that the program would lock up and freeze your entire computer.  It is hard to pin-point a solid root cause, which can range to problems with the installation itself to odd software/hardware interactions with your physical computer.

A quick solution you can take immediately is to perform a [full and clean re-installation](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) of League of Legends.  Doing so should allow us to rule the program itself as a root cause if the issue keeps happening.

Let me know if you continue to experiencing issues!

Whenever I try logging in it freezes on the log-in process and ends up as a Connection Error. Is there any way to fix this?

So  immediately after i patched. I tried to login to the game and that was fine. Everything is fine until i am loading onto the rift then my screen just goes back and after a little while it spits me out to two messages one in league that says" you disconnected from the game please try and reconnect" immediately upon clicking reconnect another error message pops up that says "you failed to connect to the server attempt to reconnect" I reinstalled the game but im still having the same issue.
same here... tried ever solution riot had for me but nothing worked, pls riot fix it

I keep getting Connection Error (Can't connect to PVP.net) every time I try to log in. I tried changing IE settings, utilizing 8.8.8.8/ 8.8.4.4 as a new DNS server address, and cmd ipconfig/flushdns. What else should i do D::::{{item:3151}} {{item:3070}}

Every time i attempt to log in it gives me a message saying [Connection Error: Unable to connect to the PVP.NET server.] 
Anyone have a fix?
can't start a game in normal or ranked draft mode.. Just says please wait for a minute then randomly pops me back to the home screen, looks like blind pick is working though...
I type my password in and when its finished loading then it just vanishes...like in it closes and nothing happens. What now?
After updating to patch 6.5,my pc completely freezes after being logged in for a few seconds.
Same. I did all the fixes suggested,and still nothing even after a clean reinstall and repair file.
When i get into lol my pc stucks and freez after the 6.5 new patch

My game updated fine. There was no update freeze. However, the client froze my computer. Like the Gangplank update. Yeah, not too happy with this. Now I'm going to have to wait for the next patch, as well as check the Boards to see if anyone else has this issue too. What I want to know is why the PBE didn't say anything about this. Seriously, besides changing tiny stripes on skins before they're released, what does the PBE do? Why do we have them if they don't tell us about any of this? But I'm getting off track. Fix the client so it doesn't crash my computer, please. Would appreciate not having to hard-reset my computer whenever I want to play a bot game with Soraka or anything.

Dear Riot employee, My computer freezes when I open league the reason for this is because i have windows 8 and it cause your game to freeze i have found ways to fix it like,
1.right click league icon > click properties > click compatibility > run the game for what ever windows you have ( windows 8 probably) > run this program in compatibility mode for (check that off) > check run this program as a administrator > apply > ok
2.open your league press play as fast as you can and close what ever pop ups there is like (lcs games, etc.)

But none of these things are working, Its unfair that im enable to play please fix it, for the rest of you try these things if it doesn't work like this comment so it can get noticed. Thank you
Was loading into a game. Game crashed. Tried to log back in, now I'm stuck at 33% with "1 file scanning". Probably going to get a time ban from it too since that's how screwed up Riot's system is.

I open league fine but then go to logg in and it says cannot connect to PvP.net servers

I have done all the trouble shooting steps in the help area and reinstalled the game.

Please help.....
My patch works but once i lunched it it still says i have version 6.4 and gives me an error. Help plz i need the free elo

Patch 6.5 causes Client to Crash Computer, Windows 8.1

I updated my client this afternoon. I played some customs vs. bots this afternoon, around 1:30 PST, and everything worked fine.

This evening, when I wanted to play again, I logged in (I noticed a very small patch update before the launcher started). At about 6:30 PST, I logged in, tried to queue up, and my computer completely froze. The Mouse cursor was stuck, no keyboard response, all of my other tasks froze, nothing. I hard restarted my computer, tried again, and it froze immediately upon logging in this time. Once more for good measure, same result.

I decided to re-install League, uninstalling through Programs and Features, and reinstalling through the main download page at Leagueoflegends.com. After the re-install finished, I tried to log in and again the client caused my computer to completely crash immediately.

I saw some threads on this forum about 6.5 crashing, and decided to try to use Repair Client. I used Repair Client, and received no error messages. I tried logging in again, and again my computer froze.

I'm giving up on it for now (Last login attempt around 8:00 PST), I hope this issue can be resolved soon.

System Specs:

Processor: Intel Core i7-3630QM CPU @ 2.4GHz
Video Card: NVIDIA Geforce Experience 2.5.14.5, NVIDIA Graphics Driver 355.82
Ram: 8.00 GB
Make: ASUS
OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit

I had the same issue. Upgraded to windows 10 and it fixed it. Not even joking. I'm starting my first game right now since tuesday, so happy!!!

This is an issue we have been looking into given the amount of reports we have been seeing.  From our investigation, it appears that Nvidia has had [some recent issues](https://forums.geforce.com/default/topic/921332/geforce-drivers/official-364-47-game-ready-whql-display-driver-feedback-thread-released-3-7-16-/) with their latest Graphics Card Drivers.  It looks like you have an older version, which might be the culprit.  Following the steps that Nvidia has provided, make sure to download the latest stable version for your computer.

If you are still experiencing issues, regardless of this, make sure to complete the steps in our [Game Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).  It should help us dig a little deeper into this issue.

Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!
Seems to work now, I'll let you know if I have any more problems.

Right after update to patch 6.5, my screen freeze and show " cannot connect to the sever " after champion selection. It works perfectly okay before update with the same wifi/ router. I have restart my computer and the router but still doesn't work"(. How can I fix it?
10,000+ Files scanned in 45minutes, anything I can do?

> [{quoted}](name=TNG Trickster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mRRyZMuf,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-03-09T21:33:41.315+0000)
>
> 10,000+ Files scanned in 45minutes, anything I can do?

Yeah I am sorry Riot this is NOT normal - none of the patches have had this many issues for me - i got to 73% and it literally locked up 80% of my cpu work load (confirmed in task manager) then I restarted now it is 30 mins later and i am scanning at 2404 files.... while my subfolders show a total of like 20K files in Riot folders and sub folders...

1/ Not normal
2/Does this mean I need to just wait for a few hours to see the game lock up due to connection issues?  

Riot are you having issues on your end as this seems like an awful lot of people with issues 'on their end'...

Oz
I updated successfully, but when I pressed launch, it says the client's version is 6.4{{champion:74}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3070}}

This is more than likely the result of a corruption with the recently downloaded files from the last patch.  Essentially, the patcher thinks you got everything you needed, but our Login Servers checked your installation and said:  "Nope!".

To get this resolved, make sure to [force a re-patch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5), which should get you all of the files you need.  

Give me a heads up if you keep experiencing any issues!

If anyone could help me I would appreciate it, but every time I click launch it just goes gray and never loads the login screen. There have been rare times where it works, but it takes 5-20 minutes. Can someone please explain how to fix this?
I wanna try a custom game, and when its all ready and i click play, the client freezes there and i can never connect to the game server.

This is definitely something I haven't heard of too often before.  Does this happen consistently every single time you try?  Or does it appear to be random?

Also, in an effort to rule out some possible root causes, make sure to try [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq6).  Doing so will let us know whether some type of corruption is the culprit.

Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!
Same Problem here :/
I type the password and everything is normal when i click on the log in... but then it shows me Client version 6.4.16_02_22_17_11 is rejected by the server. Help pls!
I'm getting a please wait screen when I select Summoners Rift Normal Draft pick and then it dumps me back out to the main home screen page, only to push play again and repeat the whole process again.
